info.+content: Theo ou la batte de la victoire

The story centers around three characters - Uesugi Kazuya, his twin older brother Tatsuya, and Asakura Minami. Kazuya is the darling of his town as he’s talented, hardworking, and the ace pitcher for his middle school baseball team. Tatsuya is a hopeless slacker who’s been living the life of giving up the spotlight to Kazuya, despite the fact that he may be more gifted than him. Minami is the beautiful childhood girlfriend and for all intents, sister from next door who treats both of them as equals. Society largely assumes Kazuya and Minami will become the perfect couple, including Tatsuya. Yet as time progresses, Tatsuya grows to realize that he’s willing to sacrifice anything for the sake of his brother, except at the expense of giving up Minami to Kazuya. And thus the story is told of Tatsuya trying to prove himself over his established younger brother, how it affects the relationship between the three, and both brothers' attempts to make Minami's lifelong dreams come true.
#4: "Kimi wo Tobashita Gogo" by Yume Koujou (eps 80-101)
"Ai ga Hitoribocchi" (愛がひとりぼっち) by Yoshimi Iwasaki (ep 27)
"Ame no Naka no One Boy" (雨の中のワンボーイ) by Aki Asakura
"Aoi Memories" (蒼いメモリーズ) by Kazuko Utsumi
"Bokutachi no Someday" (僕たちのSomeday) by Yuji Mitsuya
"Eien no Runner" (永遠のランナー) by Hiroaki Serizawa
"Hoshi no Silhouette" (星のシルエット) by Hiroaki Serizawa (eps 4,9,11,16,27)
"Kaze no Message ~Tatsuya no Theme~" (風のメッセージ~達也のテーマ~) by Hiroaki Serizawa (eps 17,28)
"Kimi ga Inakereba" (君がいなければ) by Yoshimi Iwasaki (eps 4,16)
"Minami no Kaze Natsu Shōjo" (南の風・夏少女) by Aki Asakura
"Natsu no Tayori" (夏の便り) by Keiichi Nanba
"Suki de, Gomen." (好きで, ごめん。) by Kazuko Utsumi
"White Dream" (ホワイト・ドリーム) by Noriko Hidaka
"Yume de Aitai" (夢で逢いたい) by Noriko Hidaka

title.+content: Who says we're twins!

For the sake of Koushien, and yet Ka-chan

End of the match! However, without you. . .

There's no ace for the baseball team. . .
What? Tender Ka-chan's boxer status!?
Odd circumstances how the glory of #1 came to be on his back
Tatsuya on the hill! Control is another story
Kazuya's dear wife, but the worry is about the stupid brother
Birth of a rhythmic gymnastics star! Minami has a natural gift!?
Good luck, Tatsuya! First game pitching makes the heart beat like a drum

A couple! Minami & Tatsuya's dangerous night!?
Aim for Koushien! Let's train together for now!!
First round preliminaries! Strategist Tat-chan enters!?
Show of competence! Nitta & Gatsu Nishimura are cool!!
Second round hot war! Tat-chan vs. Gatsu Nishimura
Rain prolongs the 11th! Two killed runs!! Batter Nishimura
One more extra inning!? The four-sided love affair about Minami
Shake up Tatsuya the ace!! Minami & Nitta's dangerous relationship!!
Yuka's detective story! Where did Minami & Tatsuya go?
Challenge to the ace! I'm Uyesugi's rival!!
Rival declaration! Surpassing Uyesugi Kazuya!!
Showdown with Sumiko! What!? Pitcher Yoshida!!
Uyesugi appears at last! Nitta, I'll be victorious!!
Brother, don't give up the top spot! Koushien's in sight!!
A date after school!? Minami & Nitta's dangerous relationship!!
Unacceptable!? Minami declares her love to Tatsuya!!
A love triangle! You're a bother!!
Tatsuya's extra-curricular lessons. . . Thinking too much about love!
Finally the last Koushien!!
Memories are too beautiful. . .
Don't surrender the ace position to anyone!
A puzzling new coach turns up!!
I'm Kashiwaba! I won't forgive the spoiled children!!
Tempest at the Meisei baseball club! Another problem after Minami leaves
Hard-fighting new coach! Minami's still number one
Hey Kashiwaba! Minami is the bet in the contest!!

The secret behind the sunglasses! What kind of person is Kashiwaba?
No rules of the practice game. We're watching the demon manager
Go for it, Minami! It's not suitable to give up
Minami is the student council president? An idol one way or another!
Oh-oh, we're beginning to see! Coach Kashiwaba's true character!!
Stop Tatsuya! Yuka's forced dating strategy!!
The Koushien dream! Don't rush your resignation!!
Summer is soon! How many more dropout troubles

Scarier than the demon? Lady Yuka's cooking camp!!
Chef Yuka! It's a long hard road to be a gourmet chef!!
Finally! Cooking battle between Minami & Yuka
End of the cooking trouble!? Secret taste is from Minami's spice
Thinking of the floor exercise! Minami is waiting for Tatsuya!?
First match of the competition! Now summer is here!!
Combination 1: Asakura Minami is 18! Now is the time for youth!!
Combination 2: Fight Meisei!! Kashiwaba doesn't scare us
First battle! We're not going to lose!!
First battle is no problem! The real enemy is Kashiwaba!?
I can see! Kashiwaba brother's secret
What will Tatsuya do in the second battle! Koutaro's big fix!!
Yuka-chan in danger!! Don't force the date so much
Unforgettable showdown?! Now he's back!
I'm not going to lose the third battle! Show you the ace battle!
Surprise!? Kashiwaba romance! Love this girl because she looks like Minami
It's not revenge!? No sign of the fourth battle!
Tatsuya's the ace? Under lots of pressure!?
Round before the semi-finals! Meisei vs. 3 pitchers!?
It's unexpected!? The game's not over yet!
Distressing image pile up! Tatsuya's more than Minami expected!
Here it comes! Coach's order! Wounded heart, enduring Kashiwaba's program!
In the middle of the semi-finals! Ta-chan going for the big new record!
Celebrate, victory of the finals! Our fate lies in Kashiwaba's hand!
One more to get to Koushien! Hope! Kazuya's promise
Go go Meisei! Play ball to victory!
Finals for whom!? Tatsuya, show you can do it!
No more chances!? It's coming! The Kashiwaba sign!
Let's win Meisei! Koushien is waiting for us!
New starting line, from Uyesugi Tatsuya to Asakura Minami. . .
